text: Aloys Jousten (2 November 1937 – 20 September 2021) was a Belgian Roman Catholic prelate. He was the bishop emeritus of the Diocese of Liège in Belgium. He was bishop from 2001 until his retirement in 2013. Jousten was born in Sankt-Vith, Belgium. He became a priest in 1962. Jousten died on 20 September 2021 in Cologne, Germany at the age of 83.Emeritus bisschop van Luik Aloys Jousten plots overleden ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Belgian Roman Catholic priests Category:Roman Catholic bishops
title: Aloys Jousten
